descriptionSet.description: On this advertisement for Scandale underwear, a woman is jumping high up in the air next to her silhouette, which is shown wearing the advertised product. An elaborate advertising text is printed on the right side of the image.

inscription.text: So light! So comfortable and Supple -

assuring every Woman and Girl of the greatest ease and perfect control. To wear a SCANDALE, all elastic net belt or corselet means easy living, happy care- free days. Any discomfort or difficulty which you may ever have had with your foundations will be done away with for good when you S C A N D A L E - ISE. Neither repeated washings nor the most trying tropical conditions, can in any way affect SCANDALE foundations. You can even wear a SCANDALE model without suspenders and yet it will never ride up - it fits snugly and comfortably and with just that right amount of "give".

Hints on buying your foundation: 1. Always be fitted if you can, and in no case choose an under- size. 2. Remember that a good foundation is important for your general well-being. 3. It is to your advantage to buy two similar models and wear each on alternative weeks, they will last longer. 4. Remember that there are over 40 different SCANDALE models, made in 5 strengths, so as to suit every type of figure.

At all leading stores and corsetieres throughout the World. Write for Free Illustrated Brochure No. I. B. 30, and if any difficulty in obtaining, for name of nearest stockist to: Petit & Co., Ltd., (Wholesale only) 81, Great Portland Street, London, W. 1.

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.

Any discomfort or difficulty which you may ever have had with your foundations will be done away with for good when you S C A N D A L E - ISE. Neither repeated washings nor the most trying tropical conditions, can in any way affect SCANDALE foundations. You can even wear a SCANDALE model without suspenders and yet it will never ride up - it fits snugly and comfortably and with just that right amount of "give".

It is to your advantage to buy two similar models and wear each on alternative weeks, they will last longer. 4. text-en: SCANDALE There are no substitutes.

text-en: At all leading stores and corsetieres throughout the World. Write for Free Illustrated Brochure No. I. B. 30, and if any difficulty in obtaining, for name of nearest stockist to: Petit & Co., Ltd., (Wholesale only) 81, Great Portland Street, London, W. 1.
